title: AI Resume Builder will help you find a better job and it’s an extra $10 off now
content:
Macworld

If you’re thinking it may be time for a new job, you’re going to need to revisit your resume. And if you want to get it right this time, you’ll enjoy the help of AI Resume Builder. This powerful, intuitive tool leverages AI processes to help you make the perfect resume that will beat ATS systems to rise to the top of the pile.

AI Resume Builder makes it easy to create custom layouts, with a drag-and-drop interface that lets you fully organize your resume to maximize your strengths. It offers automated data completion to streamline your creation and allows you to set up multiple resumes for different types of jobs.

Go get your dream job next year! Now through December 3, you can get a lifetime subscription to AI Resume Builder for the Cyber Monday price of just $29.97 (reg. $468).
